title: BRIEF-Oil Search Sees FY 2019 Production Being Progressively Restored
text:
BRIEF-Oil Search Sees FY 2019 Production Being Progressively Restored

Commodities 20 minutes ago (Sep 09, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oil Search Sees FY 2019 Production Being Progressively Restored Sept 9 (Reuters) - Oil Search Ltd : * FOR PIKKA UNIT, TARGETS EARLY PRODUCTION IN 2022 & FULL FIELD PRODUCTION COMMENCING 2024 * WHEN ONSTREAM, SEES PNG LNG, LNG EXPANSION & ALASKA TO GENERATE FREE CASH FLOW OF US$2–US$3 BILLION P.A. * PARTIAL ALASKAN SELL-DOWN PLANNED FOR 1H20 AHEAD OF FID * 2019 PRODUCTION TO BE IMPACTED BY RESIDUAL IMPACTS OF 2018 EARTHQUAKE & MOORING SYSTEM DAMAGE * IMPACT TO 2019 PRODUCTION WILL BE OFFSET BY PNG LNG PERFORMANCE AND RECOVERY IN OPERATED PRODUCTION * ON DAMAGE TO MOORING SYSTEM, SAYS REVISED MOORING PROCEDURE IMPLEMENTED TO ENABLE CONTINUED OFFTAKE, WITH SOME OPERATIONAL RESTRICTIONS * SEES FY 2019 PRODUCTION BEING PROGRESSIVELY RESTORED (PRIORITY BEING GIVEN TO PNG LNG LIQUIDS) AS ULLAGE BECOMES AVAILABLE * OIL FIELD OPTIMISATION IN H1 INCLUDED POSITIVE WORKOVERS AT M4 & M9 (MORAN), DRILLING OF MORAN 15ST2, SEES POSITIVE IMPACT TO FY PRODUCTION

BRIEF-Oil Search Sees FY 2019 Production Being Progressively Restored
description: BRIEF-Oil Search Sees FY 2019 Production Being Progressively Restored
